about_the_game:
A gripping detective series filled with mystery and riddles awaits you! Shocking news: supernatural beings are living among us! Sometimes, however, they don't hide well enough. Ribeira Lima, the ocean siren, has become the public's favorite in Rio, but the audience never imagined that her role in their lives is much bigger. After all, she is the only one who knows how to soothe the ocean with her magical singing! But now the daughter of the ocean is gone, and there is no one to sing the Song of the Ocean. Meanwhile, an overwhelming tsunami is coming to Rio, ready to sweep away everything in its path. So, you're the only one who can find Ribeira and save the city! Thankfully, you have all the skills you need to do it!

This Collector's Edition includes:

🏰 Make your own decisions!
The choice is yours! Manuel Costa holds the city in fear, but it's time to turn the tables. Catch him off guard before he does it to you, revealing the intricacies of a captivating detective narrative, and be careful in making your own crucial decisions!

🏰 Puzzles and brain teasers!
Challenge your intellect with an array of puzzles and brain teasers designed to test your casual games skills. Each puzzle is a stepping stone in your mystery detective games adventure!

🏰 Earn Trust in a World of Magic!
Humans aren't trusted by magical races, but you can change that! Earn their regard as you navigate through the city, gaining allies, solving magic puzzles, brain teasers and item search crucial to cracking the case.

🏰 Hunt for Collectibles!
While winning a trophy in the song contest is a triumph, true detectives go beyond! Explore Rio's secret locations, seek for hidden objects, find collectibles, and piece together the puzzle of Manuel Costa's nefarious plans!
